name: hv_memory_flags_t
desc: The permissions for guest physical memory regions.

items.name: var HV_MEMORY_READ: Int
items.desc: The value that represents the memory-read permission.

items.name: var HV_MEMORY_WRITE: Int
items.desc: The value that represents the memory-write permission.

items.name: var HV_MEMORY_EXEC: Int
items.desc: The value that represents the memory-execute permission.
